name: cohesively
content:
Add to word list

in a way that shows that people or parts are united and working together: This is about working together cohesively, not about being competitive. Getting such a talented team to play cohesively and consistently should not be difficult.
More examplesFewer examplesWe can play a vital role by helping the voluntary sector to act cohesively.We must work cohesively to deal with some of the serious challenges we face in our city.A skilled manager should be able to use a variety of techniques cohesively.
